EmailTemplate.name: CorporatePay Implementation Project Completed - Opportunity Owner
EmailTemplate.subject: {!MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c.Name} Implementation Project Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c.Relationship_Manager__c},
{!MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c.LastModifiedBy} has just set the stage of this Project {!MPM4_BASE__Milestone1_Project__c.Name} to "Completed".
If there are any issues with this email please contact your Salesforce Administrator
